title: Perma banned -_-
body:
So i got perma banned for raging today cause i keep getting iron 1 and 2 teammates in ranked although i was bronze 1 and got demoted all the way down to bronze 3 where i just could not get a fucking good team. I spent a fuck ton of money on the game, i have more than 1800 hours on the game why do i still get iron teammates ??? why do you put me in this elo hell ??? Im so frustrated with this game and its asof you dont do shit with the people that feed, its only me thats expressing my emotions that gets perma banned, there are people who tell the players top goend their lifes but if say %%%% then perma ban me gj riot fucking gj

anyways there are gonna be people who flame me in the comments and judge so fuck you you can go somewhere else

a ye forgot NA counts that as a slur
They put you down their because your mmr is down their . Also pretty toxic

To have winners, you need losers

sometimes you win , sometimes you don't , 
sometimes they feed , sometimes you do

you're always gonna have someone that is not gonna have a good game , that can be cause by multiple factor, your objective is to NOT expect them to win , and do you best with what they can provide

Like i completely agree with you some have bad some have good, I am legit winning my lanes and trying so hard to win but it feels pointless as if I'm not doing anything they dont listen and they do what they think is right, but they have like 200 hours in the game where i have played 9 times more than them

you can then develop a skill that is useful everywhere : LEADERSHIP

it's not easy to convince people to follow you ,
AND EVEN LESS to stay calm,
but i've seen people do that and it's incredible

stay calm, play gently
they might fight, stop themselves, calm the zeal of some of them , and gently ask them to listen to you
most of the time , they will follow
